Definition at line 103 of file RPCOutCall.cpp.

References SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer, and TRACE.

void RPCOutCall::processReply (  DataBlockReader    r,
bool    isException
) 
 

process the results (reply) for the outgoing call when they are received.

Parameters:
r  data block containing a partially read call reply message. The cursor is pointing at the first object after the message id in the reply message.
isException  returns whether the reply message is an exception message (otherwise a normal reply message is assumed.

Definition at line 118 of file RPCOutCall.cpp.

DataBlockReader RPCOutCall::waitForReply (  Integer    mId ) 
 

block until a reply for the outgoing call is received or exception event occurs; then process the reply or exceptional event Exceptional events include broker and implementation disconnection as well as standard exceptions.

Parameters:
mId  numeric identifier for the module being called
Returns:
a data block containing the result from the call
